coverLetter:
I have been growing and trimming for 10 years now, indoors, outdoor and wild species. Very fast and efficient worker, care a lot about details.
I experienced in many different countries, mostly in Asia and Europe.
I stay in Hollywood so might need accommodation according to location. I am free from now on till the end of the year. Will be very pleased to experience American professionalism. You won't be disappointed with me.
Thanks
